Title: Mersal
Writer: Atlee Kumar (story), Atlee Kumar (screenplay), Vijayendra Prasad (screenplay), Ramanagirivasan (screenplay), Atlee Kumar (dialogue)
Actors: Joseph Vijay, Aakshath Das, S.J. Suryah, Kajal Aggarwal
Plot: A magician and a doctor attempt to expose the corruption at the heart of India's medical industry.
